name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, specializing in backend development with **Python**, **Django**, and **FastAPI**. Adept at designing and implementing robust **RESTful APIs** and microservices with a focus on scalability and performance optimization. Proficient in software design principles including **OOP**, **SOLID**, and industry-standard **Design Patterns**, ensuring clean and maintainable code while adhering to **Domain-Driven Design** principles. Proven ability to leverage **Data Structures**, **Algorithms**, and performance profiling to deliver high-quality solutions.

In addition to my technical prowess, I have extensive experience in cloud technologies utilizing **Azure** and **AWS** for deployment and management of applications. I have successfully led the development of enterprise applications aligned with compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, while implementing **Code Refactoring**, **Documentation**, and performance optimization strategies. My strong background in **CI/CD automation** enhances my capability to deliver reliable software solutions.
